code: import _objectSpread from"/home/rise-and-shane93/Desktop/devProjects/react/weather-gif/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{SET_CURRENT_USER,USER_LOADING}from"../actions/types";var isEmpty=require("is-empty");var initialState={isAuthenticated:false,user:{},loading:false};export default function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_CURRENT_USER:return _objectSpread({},state,{isAuthenticated:!isEmpty(action.payload),user:action.payload});case USER_LOADING:return _objectSpread({},state,{loading:true});default:return state;}}
